subject: Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear valued member.
Read this special pharmacy bulletin from the leading Canadian on-line drug store. 
CanadianPharmacy provides drugs at a cost well below our American counterparts. 
For more information click herehttp://bymonth.hk
Strict confidentiality guaranteed.Made safe, secure, and reliable purchasing from the comfort of your home.
Sincerely yours,Lorna Guthrie
